Tomato plants are Farming plants grown at level 12 Farming. Tomatoes are grown by planting 3 Tomato seeds in an allotment patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 2 sacks of cabbages and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Tomato seeds gives 12.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each tomato plant, when picked, gives 14 farming experience. Once all tomatoes have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Growth time 40 min (4x10 min)

'''Tomato plants''' are [[Farming]] plants grown at level 12 Farming. Tomatoes are grown by planting 3 [[Tomato seed|Tomato seeds]] in an [[allotment patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 2 [[Cabbages|sacks of cabbages]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Tomato seeds gives 12.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each tomato plant, when picked, gives 14 farming experience. Once all tomatoes have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.
